## BackgroundPageActionAPI type

The subset of the `chrome.pageAction` that the background script makes use of

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type BackgroundPageActionAPI = Pick<typeof chrome.pageAction, 'show' | 'setIcon' | 'hide'>;
```
